plan_summary: Experiment to evaluate the impact of decreasing learning rate and increasing warmup ratio on training stability and eval_loss.
control: Baseline uses a learning rate of 0.0001 and warmup ratio of 0.03 with seeds [42, 123, 7].
treatment: Learning rate will be decreased, and warmup ratio will be increased. Specific values will be tested against the baseline for seeds [42, 123, 7].
